issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: [Python] Test suite fails with pandas 0.23.4, pytest 3.8.1

comments.body:
Apparently I mixed the keyword of the {{pytest.skip}} function with the {{skipif}} marker, sorry about that. PR to fix it is up. 

(and we should test against more pandas versions ideally ..)
